sentences.sentence: Generations of students have learned to parrot the standard explanations.
sentences.translation: 一届又一届的学生学会了鹦鹉学舌般地重复标准的解释。

sentences.sentence: Science may be able to provide some explanations of paranormal phenomena.
sentences.translation: 科学也许能够为超自然现象提供一些解释。

sentences.sentence: In this case, push explanations dominate.
sentences.translation: 在这种情况下，推力的解释占上风。
